text_block_list.text: WAAAAAH!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Gasp! Someone's in trouble! That voice came from the school gates—let's go!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: WAAAH! No… No! You're scaring me, Nature! Don't come any closer!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Don't worry, I'm not scary at all! Come here… so I can cover you in 
mud too!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: WAAAH! It's a monster! Go away!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: What're those two up to? And, uh, why's Nature all caked in mud?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Did Turbo prank her? Or, like, maybe they're having a mud party! I 
lowkey wanna try that. ☆

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Ooh, a mud party, huh? I heard they're all the rage right now! Well… I 
think I did anyway. Maybe?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Real talk though—it looks super lit. C'mon! Let's get dirty!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Sounds good! I'm in!

text_block_list.name: Helios and Palmer
text_block_list.text: Sup, Nature! Wahey! ☆

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Nobody invited you!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Um… What do you think is going on?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
I haven't got a clue. But we should probably call someone just in 
case—
SLAM!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
So this is where you've all been… I thought I told you to meet for a 
joint training session after cleaning.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Geez, Ikuno, you had me shook! Those were some serious decibels for 
just slamming your book. Talk about a literal clapback! ☆

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
Daitaku Helios. Mejiro Palmer. I believe the two of you were assigned 
to cleaning duty for skipping classes and playing around.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Well, I didn't want to ditch class. I was just feeling different that day and didn't wanna kill the vibe, ya know? ☆

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Geez, you guys are hopeless. Guess I'll have to show you how to act 
right!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
Ahem… Twin Turbo. You, too, were given cleaning duty as 
punishment for running around the room during class, were you not?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: That wasn't a punishment! The vice president just asked me to "try and calm down."

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: Is that so? Then I apologize. As for you, Nice Nature…

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: …Hm? Why are you here again?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: I want someone to tell me that…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Ooh—I understand now, Dia! It's a skit! They must be practicing a 
comedy routine!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Ah, that makes sense! Where's my coin purse? I want to support them.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: This isn't a skit! Wait… Huh? You two…

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: B-b-boom! Kita and Sato, mad props on the cleanup job aaand for joining the academy! Time for a welcome party—wahey! ☆

text_block_list.name: Kitasan and Satono
text_block_list.text: Waheeey! Thank youuu!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: A party? Really?

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
Certainly, a celebration would help ease the tension of entering an 
unfamiliar environment. I agree with Helios, actually.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Guess you really can't judge a book by its cover, huh?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Thank you so much for going out of your way for us! You're all so 
kind!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
I'm sorry for any trouble that Turbo and the others may have caused. 
Incidentally, what were you two doing back there?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Ah. Um… Well, actually, we also got assigned cleaning duty as a 
punishment. Ahaha…

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Seriously? That makes us, like, total "prison pals." PPs for life! 
Woohoo! ♪

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: So what did you do? Throw a BBQ in the schoolyard? Or maybe a skateboarding contest in the hallway? You're unhinged!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan and Satono
text_block_list.text: Er…

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: No, no! They were definitely building an ocean! I mean, Golshi was making waves earlier!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Or maybe they got sucked into one of Marvelous's schemes. You two 
okay? Do you feel like your normal selves?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan and Satono
text_block_list.text: Eeeep!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Haha, don't scare them, Nature. 
Don't worry, you two. Not all of us here are such wild characters.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Oh, Palmer! Thank goodness at least somebody here is normal!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Oh, please. Normal's the last word I'd use for Little Miss Mejiro 
Princess here.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Huh?! Mejiro?! Then you're from the same family as McQueen?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
But wait, there's more! Palmz is the explosive runaway pro, the front 
running goddess! My super runaway bestie! ☆

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
A-a goddess?! Tracen Academy really is incredible. The Umamusume 
here are literally out of this world!
Hmm… What should I do?
